Tyrael examines Blackheart's body.

Tyrael: I can not take this body. I respect the General and, should he
ever come back online, he will need it more than me. Besides, I am
much more at home in a flyer body. Come now, Kaiser. We have soldiers
to recruit.

He takes flight and waits for Kaiser outside.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Sure it's moding but Aerosmith's not coming back in the
foreseeable 
> future
> 
> ::Kaiser::
>        He looks at Tyrael warily.  "Did you just issue an order to a 
> Tripredacus general, field commander?"  He relaxes after a moment. 
"Good.  
> You will do well.  I am no longer interested in leading."  He shoves 
> Blackheart into a CR chamber with all the grace of a maimed
elephant, then 
> thinking better of it pulls him back out and removes his spark for
temporary 
> storage.  He drags Blackheart's old body around leaving his spark on
a shelf.
> 
>        He works his way down to Tyrael's location with Blackheart's
body.  He 
> dumps it unceremoniously at Tyrael's feet.  "Your body, sir."
